title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Design a small launch vehicle propulsion system. Include mission requirements, propellant selection, preliminary engine sizing, and a written justification of your design trade-offs.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Perform a combustion analysis for a liquid rocket engine. Calculate expected chamber pressures, specific impulse (Isp), and discuss methods to mitigate combustion instability.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a nozzle for varied altitude operation. Provide geometry, expansion ratio choices, and estimated thrust curves across altitudes. Submit plots and a short report.

title: Airfoil Performance Quiz
description: Timed quiz covering airfoil geometry, lift/drag fundamentals, and basic aerodynamic coefficients.

title: Flow Simulation Assignment
description: Use CFD tools to simulate flow over a 2D wing section at multiple angles of attack. Submit velocity contours, pressure distributions, and a short analysis of stall behavior.

title: Supersonic Flow Case Study
description: Analyze shock formation and interactions for a supersonic wing-body configuration. Provide theoretical calculations and compare with provided test data.

title: Spacecraft Structural Design Project
description: Create a preliminary structural layout for a small satellite (CubeSat-class). Include material choices, mass budget, and basic load calculations for launch vibration and deployment.

title: Orbital Mechanics Problem Set
description: Solve a series of orbital mechanics problems including Hohmann transfer calculations, delta-v budgeting, and rendezvous timing for low Earth orbit missions.

title: Systems Integration Trade Study Report
description: Perform a systems-level trade study for spacecraft subsystem placement (power, comms, payload). Provide integration diagrams and justify interface decisions.

title: Hydrocarbon Nomenclature Quiz
description: Short quiz testing IUPAC naming, isomer recognition, and structural formulas for common hydrocarbons and functional groups.

title: Organic Reaction Mechanisms Assignment
description: Explain mechanisms for three organic reactions (nucleophilic substitution, electrophilic addition, and elimination). Provide step-by-step curved-arrow mechanisms and rationalize outcomes.

title: Organic Spectroscopy Interpretation Lab
description: Given IR, NMR, and mass spectra, deduce the structure of unknown organic molecules and justify your assignments.

title: Coordination Complex Analysis Report
description: Synthesize a hypothetical coordination complex and discuss ligand field effects, predicted geometry, and electronic transitions responsible for observed colors.

title: Crystal Field Theory Problem Set
description: Problem set focused on applying crystal field splitting diagrams to determine electronic configurations and magnetic properties of transition metal ions.

title: Inorganic Synthesis Proposal
description: Draft a lab proposal to synthesize and characterize an organometallic compound, including safety considerations and analytical techniques.

title: Physical Chemistry Thermodynamics Problem Set
description: Solve applied thermodynamics problems: Gibbs free energy calculations, equilibrium constants, and phase behavior for multi-component systems.

title: Chemical Kinetics Lab Report
description: Analyze experimental kinetic data to determine rate laws and activation energies. Provide error analysis and discuss experimental limitations.

title: Quantum Chemistry Concept Essay
description: Short essay on the application of quantum mechanics to molecular orbital theory and electronic structure methods used in chemistry.

title: Quenya Grammar Exercise
description: Translate selected passages into Quenya and annotate grammatical structures. Emphasis on noun cases and verb conjugations.

title: Sindarin Vocabulary Project
description: Create a themed Sindarin glossary with pronunciation guides and example sentences showing usage.

title: Tengwar Transcription Workshop
description: Transcribe a short English passage into Tengwar. Provide a key explaining tehtar placement and any orthographic choices you made.

title: Council of Elrond Briefing Paper
description: Write a briefing summarizing stakeholders, interests, and proposed courses of action for the Council of Elrond. Emphasize diplomatic trade-offs.

title: Inter-species Treaty Draft
description: Draft a formal treaty between Elves and Men covering borders, trade, and mutual defense. Include clauses for dispute resolution and enforcement.

title: Diplomacy Simulation Reflection
description: Reflect on a role-play negotiation among Elves, Dwarves, and Men. Analyze rhetoric, alliances, and concessions; propose improvements.
